name: Heathpark House

reviews.text: Stayed here in May 2007 for one night. The property is somewhat imposing on initial impression from the exterior. However as soon as you are welcomed through the door, that all changes. The decor is wonderful - very contemporary. Rooms are well equipped - nice powerful shower, Freeview, and even fresh milk for the tea/coffee facilities. The bed was huge complete with stylish throw and cushions.
reviews.title: Very impressed

reviews.text: The owners were both very nice and made you feel at home.
reviews.title: Best By Far

likes.liked: — Wonderful standard of rooms and good food

reviews.title: Wonderful Property
reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent with a good choice of buffet items and cooked options. Great to have proper coffee in the morning - which for UK B&B's is not at all common!

description: Heathpark House is a beautiful Victorian country house now transformed into a first class, comfortable, family b & b where high standards of cleanliness and comfort are guaranteed. All rooms are very spacious and decorated beautifully with thoughtful little added touches. The house is situated in 2 acres of mature gardens with ample private off road parking available.
